name: Ashen Shards
description:
Ashen Shards 

This is a 3D first-person game where you play as a demigod who must protect a sacred crystal, known as the Shard. Swarms of enemies approach in waves to destroy the Shard and release the god Ashtarot. You must fight the waves to defeat the god and win.

*Made for a class project**

Programming: Ryan Magilton & Colin Page

Art: Jordyn Morris, Ian Garvin

Level Design: Oliver Deinzer

Story and concept: Gregory Back

Controls:

WASD : Move

Left-Click : Attack

Space : Jump

Double-Space : Fly
